entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer()` should check if generic method is constructed #101664
  • Support for JsonSerializerContext inheritance in source generation with JsonTypeInfo reuse #101663
  • ARM64: suboptimal codegen for Vector64.Create(1) #101661
    Future
  • IXmlSerializable makes XmlSerializer Deserialize creates instance of base class instead of derived class #101654

Closed

  • JsonSerializer allows nulls in arrays of non-nullable T #101659
  • `pal.h` will not build with clang 18 for x86 #101639
  • Strange behavior when adding a user agent #101658

PullRequests

Created

  • Change S.R.M.TypeName to be consumed from System.Reflection.Metadata package #101666
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Clean up in LowerStoreIndirCoalescing #101665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Vector64.Create for constants #101662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Ignore line endings when comparing AsnXml generated content #101657
    area-System.Security
  • fixed the split error for LoongArch64. #101656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Backport assorted changes from runtimelab #101655
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 124.0.6367.91, windows: 124.0.6367.91 #101653
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Backport #89953, #91658 and #91643 to release/8.0-staging #101579
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix x86 build with clang-18 #101650
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update build to `net9.0` images #101630
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [Testing] Backport #92296 and #92901 to release/8.0-staging #101627
    area-Infrastructure
  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [Test Only] async safe point interrupts after NOP change #101151
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove dead code in PGO scenarios. #101649
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Code Versioning - move native code versioning state #101652
    area-VM-coreclr, Future
  • JIT: Move internal reserved registers to a side table #101647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: package publishing broken #2539

PullRequests

Merged

  • Revert unnecessary changes #2567

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Wasm separate DWARF debug to different file #2264
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot load images on MAUI app #40514
  • Directories with a dot as the first character of the directory name not included in published container images #40511
  • publish self-contained app isn't working #40510
  • [NETSDKE2E]Libicu package dependency issue on Ubuntu24.04 #40506
  • [NETE2ESDK] On Ubuntu 24.04 ARM32 only, creating webapi project failed with error NU1301. #40505
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression]With 6.0.422 SDK installed, .Net Host will stop working when creating F# mvc/webapi project. #40503

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix missing files from container images when directory name starts with dot #40513
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix CONTAINER2005 error from all caps project name #40512
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix doc typo in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.CSharp.targets #40504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Consider supporting varargs calling conv in function pointers to unblock interop scenarios #3718

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Error MSB6006 "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #73252
    17.11
  • Incorrect Single Line Property Formatting Despite Appropriate Setting in Visual Studio 2022 17.8 Preview 1 #69682
    17.8

PullRequests

Merged

  • Provide helper for workign with channels. #73254
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve processing in FindRefs #73253
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Handle labels in outer scope in control flow pass #73234
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support multiple response types with the same status code in ApiExplorer #55412
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextEmptyFilter #55411
  • Use Grpc.StatusProto package from gRPC JSON transcoding #55410

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typos in APIReviewProcess.md #55394
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix typos in tooling-consolidation.md #55391
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix typo in README.md #55392
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix typos in AddingNewProjects.md #55395
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix typos in Benchmarks.md #55396
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix typos in BuildErrors.md #55397
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix typos in EventSourceAndCounters.md #55398
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix typos in Helix.md #55407
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fix typos in APIBaselines.md #55393
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT) crash on android release when forcing screen orientation #22106
  • On Platform="Default" not working #22105
  • VisualState Setters not working properly on Windows for a CollectionView #22104
  • ColectionView RemainingItemsThresholdReached is constatli coled #22101

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix PointerGestureHandler not registering touches on android #22109
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) (take 2) #22108
    community ✨
  • [Android] Crash removing item from CarouselView - fix #22107
    community ✨
  • [Controls] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #22102
    community ✨
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    community ✨

Merged

  • Improve error logging for failed resizetizering #22064
    area/single project ☝️

Updated

  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0 - fix #21197
    area/drawing ✏️, control-border
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area/Xaml </>
  • Make ImageSource more async-friendly #22098
    community ✨
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [Core] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #21962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Remove excess check in iOS input transparency checks #21883
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The instance of entity type 'XXXX' cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value 'XXX' is already being tracked. When attaching existing entities, ensure that only one entity instance with a given key value is attached. #33629
  • Help with sqlite provider in ServiceColleciton.AddDbContext() - Maui 7/efcore 7.0.18 #33628
  • ChangeDetector considers a JoinEntity as deleted even if you add that back #33627
